They are made from durable, BPA-free plastic, providing food safety and long-lasting use. Are these containers microwave safe? Yes, these containers are 100% microwave safe, making them ideal for reheating meals Can I wash these containers in the dishwasher? Yes, they are top-rack dishwasher safe for convenient cleaning. Are the lids completely leak-proof? The lids provide a tight seal to minimize leaks, but it's recommended to keep the container upright if holding liquids. What are the best uses for these containers? These containers are ideal for meal prepping, takeaway services, storing leftovers, or packing lunches for work or school.
